body_html: The above PR should take care of the redirecting. About the second problem, I could restrict students from also being coaches. Of course, if they were students last season and want to be coaches this season, this should be fine. I'll look into whether this is fine.

body: The above PR should take care of the redirecting. About the second problem, I could restrict students from also being coaches. Of course, if they were students last season and want to be coaches this season, this should be fine. I'll look into whether this is fine.
